Reviews.Title: “Loved It!”
Reviews.Author: NewBrunswickChuck
Reviews.Content: My wife 47, and me 40 stayed at Deseo for 3 days between February 8th-11th. However we returned every night between the 11th and 18th for drinks. The room was nice, the bed amazing and the balcony view perfect! The staff are fantastic from the front desk to the bartenders. Why people would discourage others from staying here because of the noise or other issues didn't do their research. We did and therefore were not surprised. We got exactly what we researched and hoped for. There is some noise but we hardly noticed. We were not in Playa to go to bed early so hearing and making some noise was okay by us Do your research people don't just complain

Reviews.Title: “Don't stay here!”
Reviews.Author: BobFiona
Reviews.Content: I booked online on the Winter Loving rate. When confirmation came through, it was recorded as Advance Purchase. After many emails I got it changed, but they still drew all the money in advance. We had to cut short our stay and they refused to reimburse us for the nights we didn't stay. The room itself is good, but unless you want to party all night it's hopeless - it's just too noisy to sleep. They seem to want to make money any way they can - although breakfast is included in the rate, they then put a tip for this on the bill at the hotel, and the rate they charge for an airport taxi is exorbitant. There are far better places to stay in Playa Del Carmen

Reviews.Title: “Never consider staying here!”
Reviews.Author: Nikita903
Reviews.Content: We cancelled our reservation after going for a drink at this hotel. Not only are the rooms surrounded by the loud, loud bar but there is no privacy. We are all up for a party but this place is taking it to a new level, not even fun you just cant escape. After we cancelled and paid in full, we were still charged for 2 nights. despite numerous emails the staff refuse to acknoweldge payment. This place is disgusting!

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT STAY HERE”
Reviews.Author: Nomad034
Reviews.Content: The staff are thieves! We were meant to stay hear and needed to cancel the hotel so went into Deseo in person and paid the cancellation fee in cash. They then charged our credit card and denied ever receiving the mpney in cash. Yes, we should have got a receipt but it did not occur to us they they would be so untrustworthy. The guy at the front desk just earned himself a large and undeserved tip (about $400). We did go upstairs for a drink and if you think you are really cool and want to prance around and feel beautiful then stay here, otherwise give it a miss. The cocktails were also very average and very expensive.

Reviews.Title: “Very loud hotel.”
Reviews.Author: Hybridair
Reviews.Content: Overall the hotel is nice. Clean rooms, friendly service, centrally located but this is not a hotel for relaxing. Their priority is to have a party atmosphere. Music is playing all day and progressively gets louder through the night. Very annoying. If you like a party scene and not concerned about sleep then this is a hotel for you. Oh and then there is the problem of Playa del Carmen itself... But that is a whole other problem. Stay clear.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic”
Reviews.Author: nilou z
Reviews.Content: We LOVED this hotel and will definately be going back. We're 2 girls in our 20's and this hotel was perfect for us, everything about it is great, the rooms, the pool, the location, its really cool and really comfortable. What we loved most were the staff. The hotel managers and the bartenders are all great, really really friendly and fun to talk to and will help you with anything you need. Santiago at the front desk was fantastic, helped us with everything we needed and was really friendly.There is always great music playing which you can switch on into your room. The drinks at the bar are delicious, i can't wait to go back!! I know alot of people say its noisy, but we didnt have any trouble sleeping at all. Everything about this hotel is perfect.

Reviews.Title: “thanks to Federico”
Reviews.Author: gennygordy
Reviews.Content: We had a great time, the staff at the resort, were great and big mention to Federico the hotel manager who really knows his stuff. The hotel is very clean, the beach in Playa del Carmen was not beautiful but in half an hour you can be in Tulum where the sand was white and the water was excellant. I can't fault this hotel, what you see on the website of deseo is what you get, we loved the place so much.

Reviews.Title: “Noisier the Second Time Around, But Still Enjoyed It”
Reviews.Author: JPTom
Reviews.Content: Having had a great experience my first stay at Deseo, I returned there on my next trip to playa del Carmen. This time, my room was on the first floor directly across from the bar. As a result, it was much noisier - although I was still able to sleep. The service was as good as the first time around, and I enjoyed myself for the 3-night stay. I would still recommend Deseo to young adults and travelers who are willing to act young. I was on business, and had a couple of successful meetings with distributors on the terrace. So even the business traveler can enjoy Deseo.

Reviews.Title: “oNe wOrD pErFeCt”
Reviews.Author: ximenadurn
Reviews.Content: We stayed 3 nights and we love it…great location wonderfuuuuulllll and i mean wonderfullll staff all of them were very very friendly and I just love everithing there.... everithing was perfect...we loved thepool and bar just one word amazing!!!!!you know trendy and fancy hotel...!!!

Reviews.Title: “White Walls”
Reviews.Author: NycSonny
Reviews.Content: Deseo Hotel has simple, clean, modern, white decor. The feel is similar to The Delano in Miami or Habita Hotel in Mexico City, but on a much smaller and less grande scale. The location is perfect, right in the heart of Playa del Carmen on the main walking road. The pool area is nicely done, and is the focus as most rooms face it. At night, this can be more of a nightclub atmosphere, which is entertaining, but also raises the noise level.

Reviews.Title: “SUper trendy boutique hotel - expect little sleep”
Reviews.Author: agner
Reviews.Content: Really nice decor, and generally fancy concepts on everything from the hammock in the rooms to the breakfast. Expect little sleep, as the DJ and the bar (great music and ambience) will keep you awake

Reviews.Title: “Noise, noise, noise and noise !”
Reviews.Author: shawinigan1962
Reviews.Content: This is not a hotel that is a MOTEL renovated with IKEA style furniture and white paint. / The motel is accessible from anyone from the street without security or staff permanently on duty to insure a minimum of security. The front desk has no view on the main entrance / The cheapest rooms have no window, just a door with a frosted glass / One staff enter my room without knocking during I was doing a nap naked on my bed in afternoon / I have found my door slightly open back from the beach maybe let opened by the staff after the turndown of the room, but nothing was missing by chance. / Some staff members smoked in front of the main entrance of the motel, not a good image for a supposed hotel-boutique / The pool is only 3 feet or 1 meter deep at best, and the Jacuzzi was out of service / A tip is automatically added to the total invoice at the check out for the drinks taken at the bar, even if one let the tip in cash (I don’t remember the barman told me anything about that!) / there is almost nothing to eat in the included continental breakfast / There is no wine (nor white or red) available at the lounge bar / BUT THE WORSE IS ... IT IS IMPOSSIBLE TO SLEEP THERE. THEY HAVE A BIG INSONORISATION ISSUE. THERE IS MUSIC FROM THE LOUNGE EVERY NIGHT TILL AROUND ONE AM, THEN THE MUSIC FROM DISCOS ACROSS THE STREET WONT LET YOU SLEEP TILL 4 AM WHEN THE PEOPLE DRUNK QUIT THE DISCOS AROUND AND THEN PARTY ON THE STREET FOR ANOTHER HOUR! At the moment of the check in, however, the motel front desk have had told me they have kind of soundproofing the rooms, or is a complete failure or is a lie! But, still, it could be a nice place for people 20-30 year old on the party all day-night long... very discrete, close to after-hours club (across the street) allowing you to back and forth... (condoms are set aside the bed).

Reviews.Title: “Thank you for everything”
Reviews.Author: KarryGo
Reviews.Content: 3 weeks ago we were at Tulum but we decide to spend some days in Playa and we were looking for a nice boutique Hotel with a great location and we found this hot spot just in the middle of the action i can say that this is the hot zone of playa just in the main av. and in the street with the best bars a nightlife i can say that this is a real design hotel not just a beautiful place but a well thought our concept with attention to detail and lots of extras for your guests. All the staff were amazing!!!!!- so kind, friendly and personable- now FRIENDS!! Our favorite activity at the bar was chilling at the jacuzzi and drinking a martini pepino the specialty of the bar!! cheers Wish to be there with these weather here!!! Congratulations my friends see you soon LOVE KERRY & DAN

Reviews.Title: “Could be amazing..But isnt..”
Reviews.Author: MFB13
Reviews.Content: I stayed with friends at Deseo. It was heavily recommended by all the right design sites etc. The hotel was really nice and well designed, but lacked being a true hotel.. No room service.. When you are not feeling too well and you want some room service, forget it, there isnt any.. Wanna coffee? nope, go down the road to starbucks.. Want a really nice breakfast? Again, go find it.. Ok, how about relaxing by the pool in the day time, because you dont wanna go to the beach? You can, but again you dont have anyone to get you anything and when you are hot as hell, you want a drink right? Another couple we met, just bought beers from the shop, but come on? Its a hotel! To put salt on the wounds.. I was offered a free upgrade when we arrived. Fantastic! 3 days later, they knocked on my door and told me to move to a smaller room! I said how wrong that was, but they could not understand my being upset?! They said, but we have booked it for someone else, i said, you should not have given me the upgrade in the first place! I would of rather been in a smaller room from day one, than move all my stuff -yes i moved it all, no one helped.. Staff are fine and friendly especially the evening bar staff. The place is very loud at night and they have dj etc.. The town itself is busy and its right in the centre of the action etc.. Go back? Nope..

Reviews.Title: “Magical”
Reviews.Author: Texasls1
Reviews.Content: If you want to relax by day and party by night Deseo is your place. The atmosphere and clientele are 20/30 something hipsters and young professionals. The design is clean and minimalist with interesting touches such as Kiehl's toiletry products, bedside package of condoms and incense. I've read reviews that suggest the balcony rooms are quieter but I did not find that to be the case. The hotel is on the corner of Calle 5 and 12 ave which is the main party strip. All of the balcony rooms face this strip which can mean a lot of noise especially around 6 am when Santanera, the local after hours club closes. If you want a quieter experience I recommend getting a non balcony room. They are slightly smaller but probably worth the quieter experience. As with any hotel it's all about the staff. The guys working the poolside lounge (Richard, German, Ruben, Billy) are very cool guys. Treat them well and they will freely give you the in's and out's of Playa including great restaurants and nightlife. This is my first of many visits to Playa Del Carmen which is a truly magical place with a magical hotel in Deseo....Salud!

Reviews.Title: “Back to Basics”
Reviews.Author: Chinita318
Reviews.Content: My husband had been bragging about Playa del Carmen since we met. So we decided to go for our 4th yr anniversary and to tell you the truth... it was WAY TOO LITTLE TIME. We flew down for the weekend and had a fantastic time. And one of my favorite things about Playa was this super modern hotel. It is definetely a party atmosphere, no families, no kids, minimallistic and w/ great lounge music almost all around the clock. The staff was kind enough to give us an upgrade at the last minute. The suite we got was AMAAAAZING, it overlooked the lounge/pool area and was roooooomie as could be. Clean lines, cool colors, amazing minimallistic decoration. The staff was always available and super friendly. Although there windows are sound proof, you can still hear the music... so if are looking to rest.. this is not your ideal place. It is for a young, energetic crowd who likes to party the "loungy" way (nothing crazy nor tasteless). But to tell you the truth, both my hubby and I slept like babies despite the music b/c we had had a hectic week. Overall, I give them a 9.8 out of ten.

Reviews.Title: “Third stay at Deseo”
Reviews.Author: Propsicle123
Reviews.Content: Good choice if you like simplistic Euro design accommodations. I write this assuming you know about Deseo and have read several reviews, checked out the website, etc. The location is great but can indeed get loud from the street below, especially on weekend nites. We checked in this time on a Saturday and literally heard yelling in the street until 6:00am sunday morning. Subsequent days were much better. Deseo recently spent a ton of money replacing the sliding glass doors with "soundproof" glass. This did help mitigate the noise but it was still noticeable as mentioned above. All the wood (pool deck, walkways, etc.) is in the process of being replaced so there was construction going on which was a bit of a nuisance. Normally, we would spend one day at the pool and the rest of the time at the beach, excursions, etc. This time no pool day. You might want to check on the completion date of the wood renovation....again, it was no big deal. We saw lots of new boutique hotels in Playa so there are other options out there....do your research.....you can't go wrong with Deseo though.

Reviews.Title: “Appalling rip off!”
Reviews.Author: bazzasatch
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel over New Years. On Day 3 we realized that it was not the style of the hotel to not give us sheets, they just had not given them to us and no clean towels, they were having trouble with laundry they said! That meant lying on exposed mattresses and dirty duvets from other guests!! Nothing to rectify problem, even after we asked them to. We were in the suite - cannot imagine other rooms. Floor permanently wet from leaking shower. Breakfast was non event. They called it a continental breakfast - it was 4 cubes of melon each and sliced bread!!! We heard this hotel used to be great - is now very sad and run down! Where as before parties started here - now no one comes! This hotel is over!

Reviews.Title: “Trendy Design Hotel”
Reviews.Author: nycaroundtheworld
Reviews.Content: Over the years I've stayed at a few different hotels in Playa del Carmen and the Deseo is my favorite. In the past I made the mistake of staying at all inclusive resorts on the beach - don't do it unless you have kids or want to have a cheesy experience in Mexico. The Deseo is a fun small boutique hotel in the middle of all the action. Great minimalist design, great service, great lounge, clean rooms and comfortable beds - all white sheets and duvet, not the disgusting comforters and through pillows most of the other hotels have. It's not for everyone as it can get a bit loud as their lounge gets crowded at night and most rooms face the lounge. If this is a problem then stay at their sister hotel the Basico. I've never stayed there but would definitely give it a try next time. If you want to go to the beach the best places are Mamitas and Kool Beach Club which are next to each other and about a 10 min walk from the hotel. Both have lounge sun beds you can rent (you have to order a bottle of alcohol but it is worth it) and in the evening my favorite restaurant is at their sister hotel the Basico. Rather than eating in their restaurant, order from their beautiful rooftop bar which has the same menu but with great views of Playa and a dj - the shrimp tacos are fantastic as well as all of their drinks. After go to La Santanera which is a great lounge around the corner from the Deseo.

Reviews.Title: “trendy . . .but don't expect to sleep !”
Reviews.Author: BLS_65
Reviews.Content: Hotel Basico & Hotel Deseo are owned by Grupo Habita. Both are trendy hip small hotels, so you shouldn't expect to get any sleep! Overall, the Hotel Basico & Hotel Deseo are (2) hotels where the DESIGN is their primary GOAL and all other factors of what make an acceptable hotel to stay are null, so don't expect competent service or quality food. VERIFY YOUR BILLS, since they are notorious for making numerous mistakes and covering up the 10% included tip with a thick black marker and then indicating that the "tip is not included". Neither of these Hotels are located on the beach, but are within walking distance. These Hotels are located a few blocks apart centered on the busiest strip of Playa de Carmen.

Reviews.Title: “More like Hotel Decibeleo”
Reviews.Author: meviajando
Reviews.Content: Upon arrival the cool Deseo certainly impresses but we found it to be more like a nightclub with rooms than a hotel due to the loud all night music from the lounge bar. We arrived here for a well earned rest after travelling through Mexico. We loved the design of the hotel and the rooms and the staff seemed friendly. After an evening out we returned to the hotel to find the lounge bar pumping out loud dance music which infiltrated our room. We asked the hotel staff when the music would die down and was told the bar would close at 1am. At 6am we were still wide awake listening to the loud dance music. The following day we checked out, cutting short our 5 nights stay, and the staff didnt seem surprised.

Reviews.Title: “As noisy as they say it is”
Reviews.Author: PS_00
Reviews.Content: I'm writing this from the hotel to make sure I don't forget how noisy this place is. As others have pointed out it is a beautiful hotel, cool, trendy and (relatively) unpretentious. The bar has a really cool scene and every visitor should go, just stay somewhere else! The noise from the bar was not too bad last night, but at 5am got woken up by hordes of people leaving one club, and I guess, going to the next. After that there were delivery drivers, random drunks, and other street noise. Then construction in the building next door. It started at 7am with one man and a hammer, then someone with a drill and a noisy generator showed up - they've been going virtually non stop now for four hours. Really, drink in the bar and stay somewhere, anywhere, else.

Reviews.Title: “Hip and Beautiful- I loved the Deseo”
Reviews.Author: RJ_Belding
Reviews.Content: This place is amazing. I loved the atmosphere, the people, the rooftop pool/bar. I went here with my girlfriend and we had the most romantic stay. The hotel choice made it the best vacation ever! If you are young, trendy, and like nice things, you will love the Deseo.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome for young, active types -- less fun for quiet, older people”
Reviews.Author: sfmwh
Reviews.Content: I personally LOVED Deseo, although it's not for everyone. It's a trendy hotel meant for young people who want to stay up late. As the other reviews mentioned, the poolside area becomes a bar at night, and the music's loud. Also, this being Latin America, neighboring restaurants remain open, in full clamor, until 3-4 AM. If you need absolute peace and quiet, look elsewhere. But if you're looking for fun, especially if you're a young gay man, this place is PERFECT for you. The rooms are designed in fun, unique ways, and the whole property has an edgy vibe to it. For example, room doors are frosted glass with a thick white curtain, so if you leave the lights on at night, everyone at pool can see your silhouette. Again, not for everyone, but fun and suggestive if you're in the right mood. The pool area also looks like it's straight out of a Conde Nast spread -- I couldn't have designed it better myself. Bottom line....if you want the type of Mexico vacation where you go to bed at 9 PM, stay elsewhere. But if you're up for some fun, don't miss this place!

Reviews.Title: “Medication required”
Reviews.Author: bondihome
Reviews.Content: The best part of the hotel were the photos on the internet. We had just got engaged in Tulum so were looking forward to having several relaxing nights at the Deseo. No such experience exists there. The first indication of trouble were the earplugs provided by the bed.....the walls of the hotel are not soundproofed from the bar that is situated in the middle of the hotel. The bar noise may have been bearable if there were people in the bar other than just the staff. We had no sleep on both nights of our stay as this noise went on til 3am .....the earplugs did not work so SLEEPING TABLETS had to be taken.....need we say more?? Also if you wak up to have a swim after a terrible nights sleep dont be surprised if you trip a few bottles from the night before...and a murky pool. Other annoyances included: the hotels 'dayclub' is 5km away from the hotel so if you feel like trapsing up there dont be surprised if there are no beach chairs and umbrellas reserved for you. The beach is very ordinary anyhow. Playa del Carmen in summary - full of tourists, cheap shops with hawkers , star bucks and burger king. BYPASS IT!!!

Reviews.Title: “I Liked the Deseo”
Reviews.Author: wave108
Reviews.Content: Beautiful rooms but rather small. Great front-desk service. Very noisy until the lounge closes.

Reviews.Title: “bare bones hotel scores points for design”
Reviews.Author: mochi227
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Hotel Deseo for about 3 nights. The room was on the patio level, but in a quiet corner. The balcony, which had a nice hammock on it, faced the side street (not main avenue in Playa, whose name I forget right now). Like its sister hotels, Basico (also in Playa) and Habita (in Mexico City), Deseo is a "design hotel," a place that focuses more on style than substance. This didn't matter much to me and my travelling companion, as we were there mostly for the beach and to hang out, and didn't spend much time in the room. That said, the (very) small room was comfortable and quiet, the bed was comfy, and the bathroom was enjoyable, but there was basically nothing in here but a bed. In addition to the amenities in the room, there were things for sale that could be added to the final bill, and you just took what you wanted (a beach bag, flipflops, Deseo tank top & undies, etc) and the hotel added those things to your tab upon checkout. This is a nice hotel for a young couple or single person, but this is not a hotel you would stay at for the restaurant or bar, the former of which is non-existant and the latter of which is pretty basic. There were some nice cabana beds on the patio, and at dusk/dark when the DJ set up came out, the patio took on some life (locals hung out here more than tourists). I would definitely go back, but if I were looking for a more "luxe" experience I would book one of the all-inclusives on the beach.

Reviews.Title: “Great Option if you can handle some noise”
Reviews.Author: E-Foot
Reviews.Content: The Deseo is trendy hotel in a great location on 5th Ave. The staff was very friendly and everyone at the reception desk spoke english. The rooms are clean and comfortable. No TV but who needs it in a beautiful place like this. They provided a free breakfast (cereal, bread, fruit, granola bars) by the pool everyday from 8am - 12pm. The Deseo has a bar by the pool that comes alive with music and people at night. It is honestly loud in any part of the hotel until at least 2am every night. It was a great place if you like to party late or if you can sleep through noise and take naps during the day. Overall, I would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Playa Del Carmen.

Reviews.Title: “They need to choose between hotel or club!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: risenjah
Reviews.Content: I would love to give Deseo a great review. It is an interesting modern design hotel. However please be aware that the "Lounge" is a full blown Club/Disco with ( in my opinion) very obnoxious music. With some earplugs I started feel like I might get some sleep until bright flashes of light started pulling all my senses away from any hope of rest. They had some photographers out shooting the party all night long. It was miserable. I would only consider staying here if they shut down the club.....(unlikely) Also they charge more for Weekend nights Fri/ Sat which are the worst for noise....in my opinion they should be trying to get half the normal rate to put up with the techno.

Reviews.Title: “A Bar, Not a Hotel”
Reviews.Author: DCMobs
Reviews.Content: I really want to give the Deseo more stars, but as I fight off stomach flu and a cold after staying there for a week, I simply can not do so. So, the good - the design is fantastic. Attention to detail in the design is excellent, it really is a study in minimalism, and I loved that element. But that is really all there is - you would expect a minimalist room with no TV, etc. to be very calming, an oasis of white. This would be the case if not for the location of the hotel and the operation of the poolside disco. Now, I know that Playa del Carmen is a late night place and that is fine. But the Deseo is built around a pool courtyard that becomes a disco. This disco is open until 1:00 AM every night - and at times there were people there until 2:00 - 2:30 AM. There is no sound insulation at all in the rooms and the music is not really "lounge" music as mentioned in some reviews. When the hotel bar closes, then the street life on 12th Street picks up. Until 6 AM, every day. I tried earplugs, staying out late, etc. - but I could not do it for 7 nights in a row. They must make more income off the bar than the rooms, because it is unbearable after a few days - I left absolutely exhausted. From a design perspective, the noise just bounces off all of the hard surfaces and there is not nearly enough attention to making the room sound-proof and a relaxing retreat. I know I sound like an old fogey, but really am not - I love a trendy hotel, but think that one of the reasons to stay in a hotel is to get a good night's sleep. With some design changes, this place could be fantastic.

Reviews.Title: “Deseo was perfect for our Rehearsal Dinner!”
Reviews.Author: Jenshana
Reviews.Content: We had our destination wedding in Playa del Carmen and chose Deseo for our Rehearsal Dinner. I couldn't have been happier with this choice. We had such a great time. The location was perfect and the service was excellent! Hugo and his staff really took care of us and all the details! The food was really good, too. They went above and beyond my expectations and I would highly recommend Deseo for any event. Jennifer & Mark

Reviews.Title: “great for party but not for staying”
Reviews.Author: Bettyy
Reviews.Content: The Deseo has definitely a very cool pool/launge arae! In the evinings the music, athmosphere, colours, divan beds... are absolutely fantastic. Perfect for a start into partying or just a relaxed evining. But for all this you do not need to sleep in the hotel. The rooms are small, sparse, no place to dry you beach stuff and way to expensive. If you chose a pool view room (the cheapest rooms) the party goes on directly in front of you window. If you close the curtains that nobody can look inside, you have no daylight at all. Safe the money, sleep somewhere else and come here in the eveining!

Reviews.Title: “Check out Deseo”
Reviews.Author: Propsicle
Reviews.Content: This was my second stay at Deseo in 3 years. My girlfriend and I stayed here for 3 nites after 4 nites at Acanto (See my review of Acanto as well). I knew my girlfriend would love this place and I was right. I'm 50, she is 42. Some people evidently dislike the simplistic approach of this property. We love it. Very quiet during the day...a bustling nite club in the evening ...playing the coolest chill out music you'll ever hear. Feel free to approach the DJ and ask him what music he's playing....make a note of it for reference when you get back home. The rooms are very clean. The decor is wonderfully simple...mostly marble, Euro appointments, piped in music, incense, no TV, hammocks on the 2nd floor balcony rooms (I recommend you stay on the 2nd floor), and very comfortable bed and awesome linens. The open shower design tends to wet the bathroom floor but throw a towel down,,,no problem. The shower head is awesome. The pool area during the day is second to none. Very tranquil with the best lounge mattresses you'll ever encounter. Cool music in the background, great view of 5th avenue from the second floor pool location, you cannot beat this experience. We loved it. Bring your camera. Check out Deseo's sister property down the street: Hotel Basico. This is a COOL hotel. A little hard, yet fun, to get to...you have to take a freight elevator up to the hotel lobby. Check out the top floor with lounge and pool area. The two conjoined pools are oil tanks converted into more of a soaking pool concept rather than a conventional swimming pool. Great view of the ocean from this top floor. Like Deseo, the rooms are simple yet very trendy. Check it out. Let me know if you have any questions.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic”
Reviews.Author: whitneyjinx
Reviews.Content: Playa Del Carmen was the site for our destination wedding ONLY because of the fantastic sister hotel's Deseo & Basico. Deseo hosted our cocktail party to welcome our guests on a Friday nite....and everything was PERFECT! I LOVE the staff, the music, the ambiance, the rooms......and cannot say enough about how warm and lovely everything was. The day of our wedding was spent lounging by the pool and relaxing. Many of our guests stayed there and loved it. Whitney & Greg

Reviews.Title: “Best in Playa”
Reviews.Author: trendyhotels
Reviews.Content: I you are young and looking for a trendy and fun place to stay, this is the hotel for you! Definetely the best hotel in Playa del Carmen... Ambiance is excellent (drinks are amazing!!), the staff is extremely nice and the rooms are very modern (you walk out of your room directly to the pool/lounge area)... The DJ at the pool will be playing music all day which makes it lots of fun for a young crowd... The hotel has free passes to the best beach which is a plus.. Location wise, you can't beat it!!!... All the restaurants, nightclubs, etc.. are right next door.... literally! I highly recommended it!!! (however, if you are looking for a resort type hotel or do not like noisy places, then this is not the place for you)

Reviews.Title: “Perfect place”
Reviews.Author: moniqueCalifornia
Reviews.Content: I spent 1 week in February/07 at the Deseo. Mostly enjoyed the hotel lounge and staff were excellent. We use Trip Advisor as a resource and were were worried about the bad reviews, however we ended up having a great vacation and relised...

Reviews.Title: “The facade of a great hotel but fails to deliver”
Reviews.Author: andyinmexico
Reviews.Content: We were supposed to have two different rooms on our stay, one a suite and one a smaller deluxe room. The first room we were in was (we found out later) the suite. It was located on the corner of the property with big sliding doors to give a two directional view. Needless to say its right in the heart of town and extremely noisy but the hotel provides ear plugs so that was a bonus. Very comfortable bed but the room itself is far too minimilist and for that, not particularly functional. The first morning we were woken at 8am by drilling and hammering into the floor below us as the wine bar downstairs was replacing part of their ceiling. We were blessed with the same the second morning as well. The shower would have been great had it not been blocked full of hair but regardless there is no divider so water floods the whole bathroom area, somewhat hazardous with the travertine floor. The fitttings are stylish but cheap and badly installed. Nobody called the first day to tell us which room we had to move to so we stayed where we were. The bar outside and pool area are largely for show and are really not functional at all but be prepared to be up until 1am until it closes. We should have complained about the drilling the morning it happened but we had more important things to do so when it came to checking out the very casual staff (there does not seem to be anybody in charge in this place) couldn't have cared less, in fact they didn't even answer. We were forced to pay for two nights in the suite as we were never moved so lesson learn't, get writen confirmation of your rates. This place looks great from the outside and from photos but I wouldn't stay there again, great facade but very average on the inside.

Reviews.Title: “Deseo Hotel”
Reviews.Author: pierrelegrand
Reviews.Content: The top corner suite was one of the nicest rooms we have stayed in across boutique hotels in the world. The hotel has the cool, small community feel to it, given the low number of rooms. You will bump into the same people again during your stay, and if you are lucky enough find some that may be of interest. The location is perfect. We didn't need a hotel on the beach as the beach is not that far away. And the tickets the hotel gives you to the cool Tides beach are to die for, as the beds are very much in demand. The Tides or Nuddy Beach Club is the hippest spot to spend the day on. Ask for a nice guy called Mundo, he is very friendly and helpful getting a bed. The staff back at the hotel are friendly and the bar tenders make very good drinks. Now, the noise. We knew in advance what we would have to deal with; but we could not have expected that it continues until 6:00am. Here is the reason; as I went to find out the root cause. The hotel bar is not the problem - that ends at 1:00am and we would go to sleep at around 12:30 anyway. It is the massive club on 12 Norte right behind the hotel that wins the prize. It goes on everyday and the clubbers spill out into the street right underneath the hotel. SO if you want to get away from that but still stay at the hotel, your best bet is the inner rooms with no blacolney on 12 Norte....this however would prevent you from staying in the super suite! A good place - if you party hard and like boutique hotels, then go here.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely fell in love with Hotel Deseo”
Reviews.Author: Bijal
Reviews.Content: We loved this hotel!!!! I was so excited about the hotel that I took tons of photos of just it! It's a small boutique hotel with around 15 rooms. The feel is very minimalist with lots of white and soft blue tones and gives you a feeling of utter relaxation. We loved the music in our room that was fed in from the music outside on the hotel lounge. The hotel staff was very friendly and really helped us setup our tours and gave great recommendations for food/drink/tours... Me & my boyfriend stayed for two nights and we can't stop talking about the hotel. Oh! and the shower was amazing......they have a sunflower head and the force is great...like a waterfall. Its the perfect spot for couples looking to re-connect in style or young people who enjoy hip spots with cool atmospheres...b/c the music goes on til 2am....so hit this hot spot and enjoy playa in this very chic hotel............

Reviews.Title: “Great service for our event”
Reviews.Author: Happy_on_the_road
Reviews.Content: I held an event here for 90 people on a Thursday night. The staff were terrific. We started just after a very bad thunderstorm and I assumed all would be soaking wet. When we arrived about 10 minutes after the rain stopped, the staff had been hard at work to be sure we were pleased and the outdoor lounge was completely dry. Service and drinks were top notch. Their barmen really worked hard to be sure we were happy and did not need anything. To be honest, I was pleasantly surprised. They considerably exceeded my expectations. It was a terrific and memorable night that all consider a highlight of our trip. Kudos to Rafa, who runs the bar, for his great team.

Reviews.Title: “A very different kind of destination hotel.”
Reviews.Author: MelechIzzy
Reviews.Content: Do not stay at Hotel Deseo if: - You go to bed before 10 pm. - You have children. - You don't like nightlife (i.e. club) - You don't think having everything in white is cool. - You don't like very modern surroundings. - You don't think the hotel should provide free condoms. DO stay at Deseo if : - You're a young single or couple and want to get away from the "family-oriented" all inclusive meat-grinders. - You don't want to be around kids. - You don't need to be right on the beach. - You like the idea of having a nightclub at your doorstep. - You like having free condoms around. Deseo is very hip and cool. The location is almost hidden from view, and WHOA watch out for that staircase (no handrail, but you can't sue them if you fall, it's Mexico, no stupid tort laws.) At night, the pool area is practically a nightclub, if you plan to wake up early and do the healthy thing and hit the sack by 10pm, then you should stay elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “Great Ambience, but Not a High-End Boutique”
Reviews.Author: Catchunks
Reviews.Content: The Deseo is painfully hip -- beautiful ambient music piped in from the lounge into the all-white rooms -- but impractical. The noise was loud and non-stop until 6:30a.m. (we had a street-facing room that opened up to the sounds of another club) but surmountable with ear plugs found at the many drug stores down the street. More nagging cons include: preening front desk staffer who had enthusiastically promised ear plugs to the room and an iron and ironing board (neither which materialized, and according to the house keeper, neither were even available!), self-serve breakfast kitchen which always opened a half hour to an hour late, and overly casual ambience and service that didn't seem to have a manager on staff, either in the hotel or in the lounge at night. Little details were missing from this hotel, despite the attempt to appear high-end, as if the builders and management were thinking the "W" on a budget. And, unfortunately, form doesn't follow function here -- you get a pumice stone but no wash cloths; a great architectural sink that's improperly installed with hot/cold reversed; fantastic body lotions in squeeze bottles that don't squeeze. On the bright side, the music is great, the rooms tres chic, travertine shower unbelievable, the bar scene apparently very gay-friendly for boys on vacation, and the location, location, location right on the main promenade absolutely cannot be beat.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful place to relax”
Reviews.Author: _Annearie
Reviews.Content: I stayed in PdC in May and just loved DESEO. The staff is very fiendly and make you feel at home immediately. The lounge area and music are so much better than all this tourist places which there are too many on fifth avenue. The food was okay and not overpriced at all, same for the drinks. DESEO is a place to sit back and relax and enjoy the soft sounds of the music. Music really did stop at 1 am and if you don't want noise what are you doing on 5th avenue? I would definitely go back next time, just to see the wonderfull staff again and make some new friends.

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed it despite the noise”
Reviews.Author: natr
Reviews.Content: the deseo clearly is a spot for the young & trendy. lounge music is played until 1 am and people not staying up late might be disturbed. we had a balcony on the upper floor room which was very nice (even with a little sea view far away). because of the nightclub (santa nera) in the same street, it remained noisy all night (ear plugs recommended). the staff at deseo is exceptionally nice. highly recommended for partypeople.

Reviews.Title: “ABSOLUTELY LOVED IT!!!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: DESEO is defintely a destination hotel. I went there first in 2004 just for a drink, and stayed there this time for 9 nights. It is defintely a little louder because of the bar, but the bar closes @ 1am so as long as you're out until then you're fine. The staff were absolutely incredible. They made the trip amazing for me, we always ended up there for cocktails. The hotel itself is beautiful - very boutique chic, service is impeccable and I will only ever stay there when I go back.

Reviews.Title: “like a fish in the water if....”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This is about the best place to feel just like you were in a hotel downtown saigon back in the 60 s. Noisy as hell. Theres no way u can get a goodnice sleep there. And if u are gay,, you ll feel like a fish in the water, cause most of the staff seemed to have a little something homy. Its not a typical hotel, its diferent and the site is cool if u are into fashion and stuff. The music is like a punishment. Lounge and house all day long, even in the rooms. For two days at the most, is fine. The design of the bulding is very cool, but thats about it. oohh no beach and no heater in pool, unless u advise the staff to turn it on, the day before use

Reviews.Title: “Very Noisy”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We stayed here one night & checked out immediately the next day, mainly because of the noise. The walls are made of sliding plexi-glass doors, so there is absolutely no noise insulation at all from the street below. All of the people on the street, the bands & the bar noise continued until 5am on a Thurs night. The earplugs that they gave us didn't help. Also, the pool area is pretty weak. I'd recommend skipping the stay & visiting for a drink instead.
